Text: Annual Meeting September Updatethe attention of Dr Kenneth L Lay Chairman and Chief Executive Officer ENRON CORPORATION Dear Dr Lay Further to our confirmation of your participation in Annual Meeting I am most pleased to send you the enclosed information which provides you with a first look at the concept of the programme as well as with practical details on your stay in Davos Should you need any assistance with your registration please do not hesitate to get in touch with my colleague in charge of your sector at the Foundation With best personal regards Claude Smadja Managing Director World Economic Forum You will need Adobe Acrobat Reader to open the attached document If it is not yet installed on your system you can download it at productsacrobatreadstephtml September Updatepdf
